I use `\` to split onto multiple lines:
~~~
if ! nvidia-xconfig \
  --use-display-device=None --virtual=1280x1024 \
  --busid `nvidia-xconfig --query-gpu-info | \
  grep BusID | head -n 1 | \
  sed 's/PCI BusID : PCI:/PCI:/'`
then
~~~
I think that works, but I would test it first.

I had to copy the text out of bitbucket in order to see it all, since the horizontal scrollbar was down at the bottom.

EDIT: hm... not sure about splitting \` cmd \` onto multiple lines. That might not work.
